name: World Cook
description:
A game designed specifically for individuals with disabilities, featuring an exciting and interactive culinary experience. Players can choose any country in the world and prepare a recipe from that country, learning about different cultures and cuisines along the way. With easy-to-use controls and a variety of difficulty levels, this game is accessible to players of all abilities. Join us on a culinary journey and discover new and delicious recipes from around the world.

Controls:
  • WASD - Move
  • E - Interact
Developed by:
  • Pedro Passos
